name: createCustomFieldContext
description:
Creates a custom field context.

If `projectIds` is empty, a global context is created. A global context is one that applies to all project. If `issueTypeIds` is empty, the context applies to all issue types.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

fieldId.description: The ID of the custom field.

CreateCustomFieldContext.description: The details of a created custom field context.

issueTypeIds.description: The list of issue types IDs for the context. If the list is empty, the context refers to all issue types.

projectIds.description: The list of project IDs associated with the context. If the list is empty, the context is global.
